name: A Wish Upon a Star
blurb: SEX - STORMS - SECRETS come alive in this HOT new Time Travel Romance!

name: There's a Monster Under My Bedtime Story
blurb: A Rhyming Alphabet Book about Cryptids from around the world, illustrated in a heavily shadowed horror art style.

name: Born To Stand Out: A story about finding your true colours
blurb: Inspire children around the world to shine bright and be who they were created to be!

name: The Day I Became a Raindrop
blurb: The adventures of Noah and Timmy.  Follow the pair as they are turned into a raindrop.  What a fun way to learn about the water cycle.

name: To Catch the Sun 🌞
blurb: A book of inspiring stories of communities coming together to harness their own solar energy, and how you can do it!

name: Questions for Breakfast - Books For Children
blurb: A bilingual (English & Spanish) 64-page, full-color children's book to be printed exclusively for donation to Reach Out & Read!

name: Tales of the Echowood: A Cosmic Fairy-Tale Audio Drama
blurb: A 10-Episode Audio Fiction Podcast from the creators of The Sheridan Tapes and Homestead on the Corner.

name: Cicada City: A Bug Club Hotel Story
blurb: An inclusive children's book about three imaginative, bug-loving friends - it's part facts, part fantasy, all fun.

name: Watch Me Grow
blurb: A children's book about growth, patience, and plant life.

name: On Needles and Pins
blurb: On Needles and Pins is a comprehensive guide to the creation of poppets, spirit dolls, and other magical figures.

name: Futures & The Knot Wound Round Your Finger
blurb: Two debut anthologies from small press publisher Bell Press

name: Running Mount Rainier
blurb: An ordinary runner's journey from crippling injury to ultramarathon finish line
